siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: CoinMarketCal is the leading economic calendar for reliable cryptocurrency news. It covers all events that help crypto traders make better decisions.
blogPost.body: CoinMarketCal is the leading economic calendar for reliable cryptocurrency news. It covers all events that help crypto traders make better decisions.
blogPost.title: CoinMarketCal - All crypto events that help crypto traders at one place
blogPost.author: Mahesh Shrestha

localize.description: CoinMarketCal是可靠的加密货币新闻的领先经济日历。它涵盖了帮助加密交易者做出更好决策的所有事件。
localize.tagline: 所有帮助加密交易商的加密活动都在一个地方进行。

localize.description: CoinMarketCal是可靠的加密貨幣新聞的領先經濟日曆。它涵蓋了幫助加密交易者做出更好決策的所有事件。
localize.tagline: 所有幫助加密交易商的加密活動都在一個地方進行。

previous.excerpt: Perfect Recall is a free app that lets you make highlight reels from your Zoom calls simply by selecting the transcript text. Share these reels instead of written notes as engaging summaries to show ‘what happened’.
previous.title: Perfect Recall 2.0 - Transcribe and share clips from your Zoom calls for free

localize.description: Perfect Recall 是一款免费的应用程序，它可以让您从您的 Zoom 通话中简单地选择记录文本来制作高亮卷轴。分享这些卷轴，而不是书面笔记，作为吸引人的总结，以显示 "发生了什么"。
localize.tagline: 免费转录和分享Zoom通话的片段。

localize.description: Perfect Recall 是一款免費的應用程序，它可以讓您從您的 Zoom 通話中簡單地選擇記錄文本來製作高亮卷軸。分享這些卷軸，而不是書面筆記，作爲吸引人的總結，以顯示 "發生了什麼"。
localize.tagline: 免費轉錄和分享Zoom通話的片段。

next.excerpt: Serverless Invoices is a free tool for invoice generating and management - no signup needed. Truly serverless, your data is safe with you in your browser. Export/import your invoices. It's open source, easy to modify, easy to deploy.
next.title: Serverless Invoices - Free, serverless invoice generator - open sourced

localize.description: Serverless Invoices是一款免费的发票生成和管理工具--无需注册。真正的无服务器，您的数据在您的浏览器中是安全的。导出/导入您的发票。它是开源的，易于修改，易于部署。
localize.tagline: 免费的、无服务器的发票生成器--开源的

localize.description: Serverless Invoices是一款免費的發票生成和管理工具--無需註冊。真正的無服務器，您的數據在您的瀏覽器中是安全的。導出/導入您的發票。它是開源的，易於修改，易於部署。
localize.tagline: 免費的、無服務器的發票生成器--開源的
